title: Pings been double for a while now
body:
So, I went out of town on February 24th, and my ping was a awesome 36 constantly, I come back in town on February 28th and my ping is not a constant 77, like it literally won't get lower than that. Yes, I know 77 isn't bad, but if you had a choice for sub 40, or high 70's, I think you'd choose the lower :D. I have the logs that show the increase, and I am not sure why, I contacted AT&T(they suck) and they said they fixed errors in my line >.> whatever, I doubt that works lmao. Imma include the tracert, i think the spike is when it hits an AT&T server though . . . . R.I.P.



Microsoft Windows [Version 6.3.9600]
(c) 2013 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

C:\Users\Austyn>tracert 104.160.131.1

Tracing route to 104.160.131.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  192.168.1.254
  2     9 ms    11 ms    11 ms  adsl-108-212-209-254.dsl.ksc2mo.sbcglobal.net [1
08.212.209.254]
  3    13 ms    10 ms    10 ms  12.81.246.130
  4    58 ms    59 ms    59 ms  12.122.85.193
  5    58 ms    58 ms    58 ms  206.121.120.30
  6    72 ms    72 ms    71 ms  104.160.134.35
  7    72 ms    72 ms    72 ms  ae35-br02.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.24]

  8    73 ms    71 ms    72 ms  ae1-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.8]
  9    71 ms     *       71 ms  104.160.131.1

Trace complete.

C:\Users\Austyn>

replies.body:
Hmmm...from looking at your ping and the changes, it looks like there might be an issue on how you are being routed to one of our Riot Direct hubs to get you to the game servers as quickly as possible.  This is something we investigate fairly consistently, but unfortunately I don't have any kind of ETA or troubleshooting steps that you can do :(

I know you would rather prefer the lower ping, but just sit tight and see if this is something we can eventually help resolve!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aZrA2Vcn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-16T23:56:33.235+0000)
>
> Hmmm...from looking at your ping and the changes, it looks like there might be an issue on how you are being routed to one of our Riot Direct hubs to get you to the game servers as quickly as possible.  This is something we investigate fairly consistently, but unfortunately I don't have any kind of ETA or troubleshooting steps that you can do :(
> 
> I know you would rather prefer the lower ping, but just sit tight and see if this is something we can eventually help resolve!

Do you know why this might happen randomly over 4 days of inactivity? I can share the logs that show my ping change over the days if it might help.
Unfortunately, I have no idea what may have happened to cause this issue to appear :(  It is something we can hopefully look at in the future and get it resolved!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aZrA2Vcn,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-17T22:47:42.302+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, I have no idea what may have happened to cause this issue to appear :(  It is something we can hopefully look at in the future and get it resolved!

That'd be great. How long does it usually take to resolve this problem? it's been almost three months now. . .

Addition: You might say "Thats what your ping is supposed to be . . . " Just to give a comparison to pings around my, A popular streamer lives 139 miles from me and gets 27 ping, I definitely don't think 50 more is correct. 

Just adding :]
